ModMetaData.name: Stackable Chunks [1.3+]
ModMetaData.author: zhrock11
ModMetaData.description:
Stackable Chunks ~ A mod to stack your unwanted chunks. Mod Version [1.2.7] Supports Rimworld Versions 1.0, 1.1, 1.2, 1.3, Royalty And All DLC
A small, simple mod that makes chunks stackable instead of singular.
'Stackable Chunks' is under the creative commons license. Cite, learn and use aspects from this mod, credit optional but appreciated ;). Please do not outright copy this mod and/or re-upload without my consent. Credits to:
- Mod Was originally created by PyxlyTurtle (earthyturtle) who has unfortunatly stepped away from modding, however I wil be keeping the mod alive from here on, but make sure to show some love to the original author PyxlyTurtle (earthyturtle)!
